attributes.name: SignupLocation
attributes.description: `Signup_location` is the location of a signup.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the signup location.

attributes.name: address_data
attributes.description:
The address data of the signup location, which includes details like street, city, state, and postal code.


Only available when requested with the `?fields` param

attributes.name: subpremise
attributes.description: The subpremise of the signup location, such as an building or room number.

attributes.name: latitude
attributes.description: The latitude of the signup location.

attributes.name: longitude
attributes.description: The longitude of the signup location.

attributes.name: location_type
attributes.description: The type of location, such as `address`, `coords`, or `online`.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: The URL for the signup location, if applicable (e.g., for online events).

attributes.name: formatted_address
attributes.description: The formatted address of the signup location, which may not include subpremise details.

attributes.name: full_formatted_address
attributes.description: The fully formatted address of the signup location, including subpremise details.

attributes.read:
Organization admins can see signup locations for all signups. 
Signup managers can only see signup locations for signups they manage.

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: how many records to return per page (min=1, max=100, default=25)
